I must say these are great reviews Niwasa. I think I'm going ahead to 
get Hokusou and Bakumatsu Densetsu for it's historical overtones (and 
romance!). I actually have Burai and Okita-Kirameki no Zanzou but I'll 
be honest, aside from the beautiful artwork I cannot make a lot of 
sense to it by just trying to figure out what's happening through the 
images.

Thanks for the scans and descriptions!

~Kizu
